title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6655.13 - State expenditures for rural areas
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6655.13 - State expenditures for rural areas

State Regulations

In each year, the office awards under the formula to the
area agencies serving areas that were outside standard metropolitan statistical
areas as specified by the United States Department of Commerce in 1978 at least
105 percent of the funds expended in such areas in 1978 for services to older
persons under titles III, V and VII of the Older Americans

Act. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
6655.13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
